actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act.
short_title: Deferred Compensation Plan Participant Protection Act of 1990

summary.text: Deferred Compensation Plan Participant Protection Act of 1990 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to authorize the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to insure deposits (of up to $100,000 per individual) in an insured depository institution made pursuant to a deferred compensation plan for employees of State or local governments or tax-exempt organizations qualified under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: Deferred Compensation Plan Participant Protection Act of 1990
A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act.
